an4.234:1.1: Atha kho sikhamoggallano brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
an4.234:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho sikhamoggallano brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an4.234:2.1: “Purimani, bho gotama, divasani purimatarani sonakayano manavo yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam etadavoca:
an4.234:2.2: ‘samano gotamo sabbakammanam akiriyam pannapeti, sabbakammanam kho pana akiriyam pannapento ucchedam aha lokassa’—
an4.234:3.1: “Dassanampi kho aham, brahmana, sonakayanassa manavassa nabhijanami;
an4.234:3.3: Cattarimani, brahmana, kammani maya sayam abhinna sacchikatva paveditani.
an4.234:3.8: atthi, brahmana, kammam akanhaasukkam akanhaasukkavipakam kammakkhayaya samvattati.
an4.234:4.2: Idha, brahmana, ekacco sabyabajjham kayasankharam abhisankharoti, sabyabajjham vacisankharam abhisankharoti, sabyabajjham manosankharam abhisankharoti.
an4.234:4.3: So sabyabajjham kayasankharam abhisankharitva, sabyabajjham vacisankharam abhisankharitva, sabyabajjham manosankharam abhisankharitva sabyabajjham lokam upapajjati.
an4.234:4.4: Tamenam sabyabajjham lokam upapannam samanam sabyabajjha phassa phusanti.
an4.234:4.5: So sabyabajjhehi phassehi phuttho samano sabyabajjham vedanam vediyati ekantadukkham, seyyathapi satta nerayika.
an4.234:4.6: Idam vuccati, brahmana, kammam kanham kanhavipakam.
an4.234:5.2: Idha, brahmana, ekacco abyabajjham kayasankharam abhisankharoti, abyabajjham vacisankharam abhisankharoti, abyabajjham manosankharam abhisankharoti.
an4.234:5.3: So abyabajjham kayasankharam abhisankharitva, abyabajjham vacisankharam abhisankharitva, abyabajjham manosankharam abhisankharitva abyabajjham lokam upapajjati.
an4.234:5.4: Tamenam abyabajjham lokam upapannam samanam abyabajjha phassa phusanti.
an4.234:5.5: So abyabajjhehi phassehi phuttho samano abyabajjham vedanam vediyati ekantasukham, seyyathapi deva subhakinha.
an4.234:5.6: Idam vuccati, brahmana, kammam sukkam sukkavipakam.
an4.234:6.2: Idha, brahmana, ekacco sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi kayasankharam abhisankharoti, sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi vacisankharam abhisankharoti, sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi manosankharam abhisankharoti.
an4.234:6.3: So sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi kayasankharam abhisankharitva, sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi vacisankharam abhisankharitva, sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi manosankharam abhisankharitva sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi lokam upapajjati.
an4.234:6.4: Tamenam sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi lokam upapannam samanam sabyabajjhapi abyabajjhapi phassa phusanti.
an4.234:6.5: So sabyabajjhehipi abyabajjhehipi phassehi phuttho samano sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi vedanam vediyati vokinnasukhadukkham, seyyathapi manussa ekacce ca deva ekacce ca vinipatika.
an4.234:6.6: Idam vuccati, brahmana, kammam kanhasukkam kanhasukkavipakam.
an4.234:7.1: Katamanca, brahmana, kammam akanhaasukkam akanhaasukkavipakam kammakkhayaya samvattati?
an4.234:7.2: Tatra, brahmana, yamidam kammam kanham kanhavipakam tassa pahanaya ya cetana, yamidam kammam sukkam sukkavipakam tassa pahanaya ya cetana, yamidam kammam kanhasukkam kanhasukkavipakam tassa pahanaya ya cetana—
an4.234:7.3: idam vuccati, brahmana, kammam akanhaasukkam akanhaasukkavipakam kammakkhayaya samvattati.
an4.234:7.4: Imani kho, brahmana, cattari kammani maya sayam abhinna sacchikatva paveditani”ti.
